          <title>
            <string language="sv">Press release</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Druckfreigabe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Version de pression</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">De flesta tidningar tar emot pressreleaser som behandlar nyheter.Modul 2 - Marknad.Ingår i FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
            <string language="en">Most newspapers take towards pressreleaser that treats news.

Module 2 - market.

Is included in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die meisten Zeitungen nehmen in Richtung zum 
pressreleaser, das news.Module 2 behandelt - market.Is, das in 
FöretagarSKOLAN eingeschlossen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La plupart des journaux prennent vers le 
pressreleaser qui traite news.Module 2 - market.Is inclus dans 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A maioria de jornais fazem exame para o 
pressreleaser que trata news.Module 2 - market.Is incluído em 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La maggior parte dei giornali prendono verso 
pressreleaser che tratta news.Module 2 - market.Is incluso in 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι περισσότερες εφημερίδες παίρνουν προς το 
pressreleaser που μεταχειρίζεται την ενότητα 2 ειδήσεων - η 
αγορά συμπεριλαμβάνεται σε FφretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La mayoría de los periódicos toman hacia el 
pressreleaser que trata news.Module 2 - market.Is incluido en 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
